channel.title: Gluon gun particles
channel.description:
Getting killed while using gluon gun sometimes causes particles from gluon gun to appear on other guns until level change or reconnect. I'm talking about MP of course.
[url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=437943271[/url]

item.title: Gluon gun particles
item.dc:creator: KyuuGryphon
item.description:
I’ve noticed a similar bug wherein if you swap from the Tau Cannon to another weapon just after firing (not sure if it only works on charged shots or all shots), the Tau Cannon particle effect will linger for a brief moment at the weapon’s muzzle.

Read full topic
